desc: The WAFI COLORS BD Eco-Passport ZDHC level-3 (latest MRSL V3) certificate for 15 Regular & Fluorescent Colourants has been released and Published in the ZDHC Gateway platform. Also, you can find it in online inventory portals like cleanchain, Bhive, BVE3. Thanks for your patience.

title: ZDHC Chemcheck Summary Report-2024
desc: ZDHC ChemCheck is a product passport of chemical formulations that verifies ZDHC MRSL LEVEL - 3 conformance. It provides an easy-to-read synopsis, which facilities and brands can understand to make informed sustainable procurement decisions.The ChemCheck Summary report allows Formulators to generate customer-specific summary reports of ZDHC MRSL LEVEL - 3 conformant products and their product specification.Each report includes a chemical product summary, outlining the ZDHC MRSL LEVEL - 3 achieved, and an explanation of related conformance levels. It also includes details from the chemical manufacturer, available certificate, technical specifications and SDS availability.

title: ZDHC ChemCheck Summary Report - 2023
desc: ZDHC ChemCheck is a product passport of chemical formulations that verifies ZDHC MRSL conformance. It provides an easy-to-read synopsis, which facilities and brands can understand to make informed sustainable procurement decisions.Each report includes a chemical product summary, outlining the ZDHC MRSL level achieved, and an explanation of related conformance levels. It also includes details from the chemical manufacturer, available certificate, technical specifications and SDS availability.ChemCheck report is exclusive to all products uploaded in the Chemical Module of the ZDHC Gateway. It provides a landmark for the identification of safer choices and the formulator's efforts in creating greener chemistry that helps to keep the industry's supply chain clean.
